article.headline: Sam Houston St. 86, Texas State 73
article.story: HUNTSVILLE, Texas (AP) -- Jason Stephenson and Joe Thompson each scored 24 points to lead Sam Houston State to an 86-73 win over Texas State on Thursday night. Stephenson also grabbed 10 rebounds and Thompson had nine assists for Sam Houston State (11-11, 6-5 Southland). Auguste Wilder added 19 points. Sam Houston State led 42-37 at the half and pulled away to a 15-point lead at 59-44 with 14:44 left in the second half on a basket by Stephenson. The Bobcats (12-10, 7-4) cut the margin to five points at 71-66 before Thompson hit a basket with 4:13 left to seal the victory. Josh Naylor led Texas State with 18 points. Roosevelt Brown added 16 and Zach Allison had 12.
